title: Prime Day 2019: Campingaz Gas BBQ almost half price in Amazon sale
text:
If your current barbecue’s days are numbered, now is the perfect time to get your hands on a new one at a fraction of the price.

As part of its Prime Day sale, Amazon is selling the Campingaz Gas BBQ 4 Series for a steal at £240.

With a recommended retail price of £439.99, that’s an impressive saving of £199.99, or 45 per cent.

Our IndyBest team has hand-picked this deal. We may earn some commission from the links in this article, but our selections have been made independently and without bias. This revenue helps to fund journalism across The Independent.

With plenty of summer nights ahead, there’s no better way to spend time outside with family and friends than by firing up the barbecue and cooking up a feast.

But, why should you pick this one?

Aside from the impressive price cut, which will leave you with more money to spend on sirloin and sausages, the Campingaz barbecue has a host of benefits including a steel cooking surface for evenly distributed heat that guarantees perfectly cooked food every time.

The fully-featured gas grill also makes light work of preparing al fresco feasts. With an extra side burner that can be used for smaller dishes or sauces, while an integrated thermometer in the lid makes it easy to ensure food is properly cooked.

One of the major plus points is that it also comes with a base for the culinary modular system which can be used to heat up everything from paella pans and woks to pizza stones.

The Campingaz barbecue has received a number of five star reviews on Amazon with customers praising the grill for its “excellent cooking standards” and being “quick, easy, clean and efficient” to use”.
